channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Republicans win Florida special elections in Trump strongholds by narrower margins than in 2024
item.description: Republicans Jimmy Patronis and Randy Fine have won special elections in two Florida congressional districts.

item.title: Democratic-backed Wisconsin state schools chief Jill Underly wins reelection over GOP-backed rival
Forecasters warn of deadly floods and strong tornadoes in parts of the Midwest and South
